summary: All previously identified issues have been addressed with appropriate fixes and no new blocking problems introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Conviction scoring timeout used Promise.race without clearing timer, risking unhandled rejections and timer leaks
previous_issues_status.notes: Timeout now cleared on both success and failure using a wrapped Promise; this resolves the leak and unhandled rejection risk.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Idempotency key extraction blindly cast header to string and failed to handle array/empty cases
previous_issues_status.notes: Header normalization now handles string/array and trims empty values, falling back to UUIDv4 as required.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: channelId only taken from session; missing header handling
previous_issues_status.notes: Header-based channelId extraction added with safe fallback to session.
